title: RENOVATED 3 Bedroom home - By APPT Only!!
posting_body: ['Amazing Home - Fully Rehabbed - E-mail for application & Appointment today', 'You must e-mail for application, and bring it with you to the appointment filled out!!!!', 'Beautiful  Newly Rehabbed', '- 3 Bedroom /1', 'Bath', 'House Information:', '- Totally Rehabbed home with Many Upgrades', '- 3 Bedrooms home', '- Gorgeous new flooring', '- All new kitchen!!!', '- All new bathroom, furnace, etc.', 'Gorgeous Home!', 'Location', ': 1074 Mount, Gary, Indiana', 'Rent Amount', ': $900 per month', 'Security Deposit', ': A money order for one month security deposit ($900) needed at time of lease.', 'Availability Date', ': Immediate Occupancy Available', 'We WILL find our tenant quickly so do not miss the opportunity to rent this lovely new home!!', 'Please email for an application and bring it to the appointment, or fax or e-mail it back to us (We prefer it be sent back prior to the appointment) .', 'Separate applications need to be completed for each person living in the home over the age of 18.', 'There is no application charge if you bring your security deposit with you and sign a lease on the property', '.', 'Owner will only perform a criminal background check of interested applicants.', 'There is no credit check to rent this home!', 'We look forward to meeting you at the appointment Feel free to call or e-mail with questions.', 'Quality Rental Property Specialists', 'Gary, IN']
